processingDuration.title: Processing duration: 3-5 months.
processingDuration.note: Though it may vary according to the university.

applicationProcessOverview.title: Overview of application process:
applicationProcessOverview.content: At MKN Global Consultant, our approach to assisting applicants is methodical and comprehensive. We initiate the process by diligently collecting all required documents from our clients, ensuring nothing is overlooked. With meticulous attention to detail, we navigate the application maze on behalf of our clients, submitting their applications to universities or colleges with precision and expertise. Upon receiving offer letters, we guide them through the subsequent steps, facilitating payments to institutions and meticulously organizing the submission of supplementary documents. Our dedicated team ensures the seamless acquisition of the CAS letter, a critical document in the application journey. Finally, we stand by our clients as they face the Home Office or embassy, providing unwavering support throughout the final stages of the application process. With MKN Global Consultant, applicants receive comprehensive guidance and support at every step, ensuring a smooth and successful application experience.
